featured.text: In what order did the following protective hats appear? a. fiberglass hats b. hats with see-through shields c. hats with canvas and leather d. hats with tar over them (A)

definition.zh_def: 保護性的，能夠提供防護或安全的。
definition.en_def: Serving to protect or shield from harm or danger.
definition.example: She wore a protective helmet while riding her bike.
